## VMKeyboard.press() method

Shortcut for [VMKeyboard.down()](./assistive-playwright-client.vmkeyboard.down.md) and [VMKeyboard.up()](./assistive-playwright-client.vmkeyboard.up.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
press(key: string, options?: {
        delay?: number | undefined;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Name of the key (cf [Key](./vm-providers.key.md)<!-- -->) or its corresponding character, for example <code>PageUp</code> or <code>a</code>. Shortcuts such as <code>&quot;Control+a&quot;</code> or "Control+Shift+a" can also be specified, as documented in [https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-keyboard\#keyboardpresskey-options](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-keyboard#keyboardpresskey-options) |
|  options | { delay?: number \| undefined; } | <code>delay</code>: delay in milliseconds between keydown and keyup events |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
